se.jguru.nazgul.core.osgi.launcher.api.event

Interface OsgiFrameworkListener<T extends EventConsumer<T>,S>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The exact subtype of OsgiFrameworkListener in effect
    S - The OSGi service object type to subscibe to. This might be a standard ServiceReference or a BlueprintContainer depending on the implementation.
    All Superinterfaces:
    se.jguru.nazgul.core.clustering.api.Clusterable, Comparable<T>, EventConsumer<T>, EventListener, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlueprintServiceListener

    public interface OsgiFrameworkListener<T extends EventConsumer<T>,S>
extends EventConsumer<T>
    Listener specification for receiving callbacks when the OSGi framework emits events for BlueprintContainer services.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void afterServiceAdded(S serviceObject)
      Event callback method invoked after an OSGi service was added to the underlying OSGI Framework.
      void beforeServiceRemoved(S serviceObject)
      Event callback method invoked before an OSGi service was removed from the underlying OSGI framework.
      void onServiceModified(S serviceObject)
      Event callback method invoked when an OSGi service was modified within the underlying OSGI framework.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Comparable

        compareTo

      • Methods inherited from interface se.jguru.nazgul.core.clustering.api.Clusterable

        getClusterId

    • Method Detail

      • afterServiceAdded

        void afterServiceAdded(S serviceObject)
        Event callback method invoked after an OSGi service was added to the underlying OSGI Framework.
        Parameters:
        serviceObject - A reference to the service just added.

      • beforeServiceRemoved

        void beforeServiceRemoved(S serviceObject)
        Event callback method invoked before an OSGi service was removed from the underlying OSGI framework.
        Parameters:
        serviceObject - A reference to the service to be removed.

      • onServiceModified

        void onServiceModified(S serviceObject)
        Event callback method invoked when an OSGi service was modified within the underlying OSGI framework.
        Parameters:
        serviceObject - A reference to the modified service.
